product_name: Patagonia Better Clog Clogs - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Better Clog clogs from Patagonia are classic, lightweight, full-grain leather clogs that are made with environmentally conscious leathers and recycled materials. Full-grain leather uppers are lined with smooth pigskin for comfort and durability. Latex footbed is also lined with glove-like pigskin for comfort. Molded arch shank lets forefoot flex naturally; EVA insoles cushion and support. Glide-Right platform allows heel strike and toe spring to create a smooth heel-to-toe transition. 20% recycled-rubber outsole provides traction and durability; rubber extends around the sides of the heel for additional stability. Women's Better Clog clogs from Patagonia feature elastic insets on the side to ease on/off. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Better Clog clogs from Patagonia are classic, lightweight, full-grain leather clogs that are made with environmentally conscious leathers and recycled materials.
